name: extract.autodesk.io
description: A Node.js server to extract Autodesk Forge Viewer bubbles

FORGE_CLIENT_ID.description: Replace with your FORGE CLIENT ID KEY

FORGE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Replace with your FORGE CLIENT SECRET KEY

MJ_APIKEY_PUBLIC.description: (Optional) Replace with your MailJET PUBLIC KEY

MJ_APIKEY_SECRET.description: (Optional) Replace with your MailJET SECRET KEY
